title: Godsend - Novel Updates
author: 전우영
description:
I got a present.

[‘RANDOM (SSS)–God’s Gift’ has arrived.]
Not only that, but from god…

___

It’s something I remember thinking a long time ago as a young kid.

Wouldn’t it be awesome if I could wake up to a present in my hands every morning as if Santa had been by on Christmas eve?

Then, on December 2033…

“The hell is this?”

The present in my hands I woke up to in my rented single-room apartment, shivering from trying to save on heating fees, was not from Santa but from God.>
